Getting Started.title: Getting Started with Scanpay
Getting Started.meta: Getting started with Scanpay and online payments.

Payment Link.title: Payment Link API
Payment Link.meta: Generate payment links, that you can send to your customers.

Synchronization.title: Synchronization API
Synchronization.meta: The synchronization API will keep all your systems up-to-date with changes to your payments.

Subscriptions.title: Subscriptions API
Subscriptions.meta: The Subscriptions API allows you to handle recurring payments. You can use it to charge customers regularly or after certain events.

Acquiring banks.title: Supported acquiring banks
Acquiring banks.meta: Accept payments online through one of our acquiring banks.

E-commerce modules.title: Scanpay E-commerce modules
E-commerce modules.meta: E-commerce modules & plugins for easy integration with Scanpay.

WooCommerce.title: WooCommerce Payment Plugin - Scanpay
WooCommerce.meta: Scanpay payment plugin for WooCommerce. Accept payment cards and MobilePay in WooCommerce.

Magento 2.title: Magento 2 Payment Module - Scanpay
Magento 2.meta: Scanpay payment module for Magento 2. Accept payment cards and MobilePay in Magento.

PrestaShop.title: PrestaShop Payment Module - Scanpay
PrestaShop.meta: Scanpay payment module for PrestaShop. Accept payment cards and MobilePay in PrestaShop.

Thirty Bees.title: Thirty Bees Payment Module - Scanpay
Thirty Bees.meta: Scanpay payment module for Thirty Bees. Accept payment cards and MobilePay in Thirty Bees.

OpenCart.title: OpenCart Payment Module - Scanpay
OpenCart.meta: Scanpay payment module for OpenCart. Accept payment cards and MobilePay in OpenCart.

API Libraries.title: API Libraries
API Libraries.meta: Scanpay has official client libraries for popular programming languages.

Security.title: Security
Security.meta: Scanpay is PCI DSS certified and security is very important to us.
